docs.snippet: With the acquisition by the Bethlehem Steel Corporation of the McClintic-Marshall Construction Company of Pittsburgh the competitive situation, so far as the marketing of structural steel is concerned, has been seriously intensified, according to...
docs.lead_paragraph: With the acquisition by the Bethlehem Steel Corporation of the McClintic-Marshall Construction Company of Pittsburgh the competitive situation, so far as the marketing of structural steel is concerned, has been seriously intensified, according to steel executives.

headline.main: SEE BETHLEHEM AIM TO ADD MORE UNITS; Observers Believe the Steel Company is After Three Concerns Here. COMPETITION IS INTENSIFIED Purchase of McClintic-Marshall Raised Fabricating Capacity to 900,000 Tons. Seen as Spur to Other Concerns. Big Outlet in Building Industry.
